articles.title: Spokesman for C.C., UAWK Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Reckless Moves
articles.content:
Spokesman for C.C., UAWK Assails U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces' Reckless Moves
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The agricultural workers of the DPRK will make the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group keenly realize what high price they will pay for their hideous moves to get the sun eclipsed.
					 A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) said this in a statement on Sunday.
					
					 The heinous crimes of the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors keen to get the sun eclipsed, which represents our life and destiny, can never be pardoned and they deserve a severe punishment, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 This moment, the brave agricultural soldiers of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards on attack positions to liberate the southern half of Korea together with the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army are waiting for a final order of the all-people, all-state sacred war to deal baptism of merciless retaliatory battle to the atrocious U.S. imperialists and Park Geun Hye group.
					
					 The beast-like U.S. imperialists would sustain an unimaginable defeat and traitor Park and her group doing only bad things with the backing of the U.S. are doomed to be forlorn wandering spirits before the spirit of all the service personnel and people of the DPRK to devotedly defend the leader and their will to annihilate the enemies.

articles.title: U.S., Park Geun Hye Group Will Never Be Pardoned: Chondoist Chongu Party
articles.content:
U.S., Park Geun Hye Group Will Never Be Pardoned: Chondoist Chongu Party
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party in a statement Sunday denounced the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors for resorting to thrice-cursed provocative acts to do harm to the God of the Korean nation.
					 Vehemently denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the Park group of traitors for their hideous crimes in the name of all the Chondoists and party members, the statement went on:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and the Park group are made up of evils whom our Chondoists must not pardon generation after generation.
					
					 We, Chondoists, will together with the service personnel and people mercilessly punish the wicked provocateurs who challenged the sacred dignity and social system of the DPRK dearer than their own lives.
					
					 We have a proud tradition of patriotism in which we took the lead in defending the sovereignty and dignity of the country and the nation under the uplifted banner of "rejection of west and Japan" and "promotion of national interests and welfare of the people."
					
					 The Central Committee of the Chondoist Chongu Party solemnly warns once again that if the U.S. and the Park group persist in hideous crimes to do harm to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK in defiance of its repeated warnings, they will be reduced into ashes by retaliatory blows to be dealt by its service personnel and people.
					
					 The south Korean Chondoists should clearly face up to the grave situation and turn out as one in the sacred and just actions for wiping out devils that encroach upon the dignity of the nation and invite all disasters to this land, and for building a reunified and prosperous earthly paradise.

articles.title: Women Performing Great Feats in 70-day Campaign
articles.content:
Women Performing Great Feats in 70-day Campaign
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Women in the light industry of the DPRK have made great labor achievements in the ongoing 70-day campaign to greet the 7th Congress of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 All employees at the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Silk Mill carried out their production quotas for the first half of this year as of March 10 and four of them hit their yearly targets.
					
					 At the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, a weaver fulfilled her yearly plan as of March 6, followed by six others, and nearly 100 weavers their first half-yearly plans.
					
					 Four employees carried out their yearly production plans at the Hamhung Silk Mill where other employees executed their plans for the first half of this year as of March 12.
					
					 Several weavers hit their yearly and first half-yearly targets at the Sariwon Textile Mill and more than ten carried out their first half-yearly plans at the Hamhung Woolen Mill and more than 20 at the September Textile Mill.
					
					 Similar achievements were also made at the Kusong Textile Mill.

articles.title: Service Personnel, People of DPRK Turn out in Sacred Battle to Defeat Enemies
articles.content:
Service Personnel, People of DPRK Turn out in Sacred Battle to Defeat Enemies
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- All the service personnel and people of the DPRK have turned out in the sacred battle to defeat the enemies who committed thrice-cursed provocations.
					 Guards divisions which performed distinguished feats during the Fatherland Liberation War and all other units of the Korean People's Army are fully ready to annihilate the enemies.
					
					 The officers and men of the units on the whole front are in combat readiness.
					
					 Pilots on combat-duty loaded bombs instead of fuel for return with full of retaliatory will to mercilessly blow up the dens of aggression.
					
					 Seamen are also in perfect readiness with the retaliatory will to bury all the aggressor warships in the deep sea if an order of charge is issued.
					
					 The strike means of the Strategic Force of the Korean People's Army including miniaturized and precision nuclear weapons are on the stand-by to physically blow up the major targets in the operation area of south Korea, U.S. imperialist aggressor forces' bases in the Asia-Pacific region and Washington, the cesspool of evils.
					
					 The service personnel of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces are sharpening the sword for protecting the leader, social system and people to thoroughly smash even a slight move of the class enemies and hostile forces hatching sinister plots on this land.
					
					 The members of the Worker-Peasant Red Guards and the Young Red Guards across the country are making innovative achievements day and night in the ongoing 70-day campaign while getting themselves fully ready to defend their land.
					
					 Enthusiastic young people have risen up in the battle for devotedly safeguarding the leader.
					
					 Working people volunteer to join or rejoin the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The round-the-clock campaign is dynamically going on to develop more various highest-level military strike means and Juche bombs of Korean style necessary for liberating the southern half of Korea.
					
					 War veterans and discharged soldiers are turning out in the battle to defend the leader and the motherland and schoolchildren send encouraging letters to the front units.
					
					 All the service personnel and people are waiting for a final order of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, while renewing their will to smash the desperate provocations of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean warmongers who dare try to hurt the supreme headquarters of the DPRK, and liberate the southern half of Korea.

articles.title: DPRK Citizens Hail KPA's Ultimatum
articles.content:
DPRK Citizens Hail KPA's Ultimatum
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Citizens in the DPRK fully support the ultimatum to the south Korean puppet group recently issued by the long-range artillery force of the Korean People's Army.
					 Kim Han Il, manager of the Chollima Steel Complex, told KCNA:
					
					 The KPA's ultimatum is as good as the last warning to those provokers by the workers of my complex.
					
					 The respected Marshal Kim Jong Un is the great sun of Songun Korea representing the destiny and future of the Korean nation.
					
					 It is a never-to-be-condoned crime to point an accusing finger at the sun.
					
					 Harsh punishment should be given to the provokers who dared stage "precision striking drill" aimed to destroy the office of our supreme leadership.
					
					 Kang Song Man, a war veteran residing in Pyongyang, said:
					
					 If the group of traitors does not respond to the ultimatum, it will be natural for the KPA to launch an operation for merciless preemptive strike at once.
					
					 Our ancestors had put to death any traitor to the nation together with his or her families of three generations, erasing them from the genealogy.
					
					 I could appease my surging anger only when I see the Chongwadae and other reactionary ruling machines in south Korea reduced to ashes by the KPA's preemptive strike for retaliation.
					
					 It is urgently needed to show the riff-raffs of the world how the powerful Paektusan army metes out dreadful punishment to those provokers.
					
					 Pak Su Bok, chairman of the Songyo District, Pyongyang, Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, said: 
					
					 There is a limit to our patience.
					
					 Only merciless military retaliation is fit for those villains who dared to hurt the dignity of our supreme leadership, seeking to plunge the Korean nation into disaster of a nuclear war.
					
					 With our strong will to annihilate the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces, we young people are dying for the start of KPA military action to subdue the southern part of Korea.

articles.title: Puppets' Ruling Machines Doomed to Ruins: Pyongyang Citizen
articles.content:
Puppets' Ruling Machines Doomed to Ruins: Pyongyang Citizen
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A few days ago, the Korean People's Army staged an intensive striking drill of long-range artillery pieces aimed at destruction of the Chongwadae and other reactionary ruling machines in Seoul.
					 In this regard, Ri Hyon Gil, a Pyongyang citizen, told KCNA:
					
					 The striking drill makes me visualize the ruins of power organs in flames. There are no one alive, I imagine, and only heaps of ashes, twisting flames, black smoke and crushed blocks and glass.
					
					 The ruins herald the doom of the Park Geun Hye puppet group of traitors.
					
					 If it was real, there might be no one left to regret for imprudently pointing a finger at the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK or beg for surrender.
					
					 We citizens are eagerly longing for the moment of revenge.

articles.title: KPA Units in Full Readiness for Preemptive Attack on Provokers
articles.content:
KPA Units in Full Readiness for Preemptive Attack on Provokers
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- With the news about the ultimatum to south Korea's Park Geun Hye group issued by the long-range artillery force of the Korean People's Army, all its services and arms units have taken a full posture for preemptive attack on the provokers.
					 Hyon Ki Chong, a general officer of the KPA, told KCNA:
					
					 Pilots of the Air Force are now in full readiness for sortie to attack the reactionary ruling machines of south Korea and the U.S. military bases when the long-range artillery force starts its operation of strike.
					
					 And all the anti-aircraft rocket units, too, are in high alert to shoot down all enemy planes.
					
					 An officer Kim Jin Hyon declared that all submarines and battles ships of the KPA are ready to attack the south Korean puppet forces and the U.S. imperialist aggressor forces.
					
					 Noting that world meida had described the testfire of submarine-based ballistic missile as an expression of the DPRK's tremendous military strength and a sort of warning to the U.S., he said that any provokers would never escape KPA's ballistic missile strike.
					
					 Another officer Ri Kye Sik said: All commandos of my unit are eager to wipe out the provokers who worked out an "operation for striking the leadership" of the DPRK, before the attack by KPA long-range artillery force.

articles.title: Efforts Paid to Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Work
articles.content:
Efforts Paid to Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Work
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The DPRK strives to put the hygienic and anti-epidemic work on a scientific and technological basis.
					 The National Hygienic and Anti-epidemic Center under the Ministry of Public Health has regularly informed its affiliated units of details on the outbreak of epidemics across the world as well as latest scientific and technological data.
					
					 And on-line information exchange between them is brisk thanks to the recently developed epidemiological chart based on observations of pollution.
					
					 Meanwhile, telemedicine helps increase the ability of medical workers.
					
					 A scientific research into producing efficacious vaccines is pushed forward in keeping with the developing medical science and technology.
					
					 Hygienic information activities are getting momentum as part of the efforts to prevent the inroads of world-known diseases like Zika virus into the country.

articles.title: Spring Land Management on Large Scale
articles.content:
Spring Land Management on Large Scale
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- General mobilization for land management in spring is getting momentum in the DPRK.
					 According to an official concerned, efforts will be mainly concentrated on forestation and road and river improvement during the spring campaign.
					
					 As part of the seasonal forest restoration campaign, a large number of saplings were transplanted.
					
					 The rooting rate of saplings transplanted last year was reviewed at every institution, enterprise and cooperative unit to urge tree-planting on a scientific basis this year.
					
					 Efforts are paid to building nurseries, raising fertility of sapling fields and digging wells and water holes for the prevention of drought damage.
					
					 Building and repairing of embankments and anti-tidal dykes are also accelerated in different parts of the country, including North and South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. for Lacking in Its Power of Discernment
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Ridicules U.S. for Lacking in Its Power of Discernment
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- After the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK fired new type large-caliber multiple rocket launching system, the south Korean puppet forces blustered that the north launched short-range missiles as if something serious had happened. No sooner had the report of the puppet forces been made than the special representative of the U.S. State Department for the Korea policy and the spokesperson of the U.S. State Department for the East Asian and Pacific Affairs and a spokesperson for the U.S. Defense Department vied with each other in saying that missile launch by use of ballistic missile technology is a clear violation of the UN Security Council's "resolution" and the DPRK should refrain from escalating tension and focus on taking detailed measures for keeping international promise and duty.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 It seems the U.S. has become so nervous as to mistake the thunder for the nuclear explosion as it failed to discern the ballistic missile fire and multiple rocket launching system fire.
					
					 The DPRK's recent measures are due ones for self-defense to stand up against the U.S. which is staging a series of military acts aiming at the former's headquarters by mobilizing the largest number of aggression troops and strategic assets in history.
					
					 It is necessary to mercilessly wipe out the aggressors ignorant of common sense and reasons.
					
					 The DPRK will continue taking ceaselessly strong countermeasures of Korean style to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country and nation unless the U.S. drops nuclear threat and blackmail and hostile policy.
					
					 No one is allowed to blame the DPRK for this as it is its exercise of self-defensive right.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Finding Fault with DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defense
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams Park Geun Hye for Finding Fault with DPRK's Nuclear Deterrent for Self-Defense
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Traitor Park Geun Hye in a recent "state council meeting" took issue with the DPRK's measures for bolstering up the nuclear deterrent for self-defense. Talking about the "north's will to conduct nuclear test" and "reckless threat", she cried out for "top military posture".
					 A spokesman for the puppet Foreign Ministry talked about the "resolute counteraction" against the "north's nuclear provocation".
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 No matter how desperate efforts the Park Geun Hye group may make to escalate the confrontation while letting out rhetoric, they can never shake the DPRK's determination and will to resolutely punish the provocateurs with the nuclear thunder of justice. 
					
					 The group of traitors has become evermore undisguised in citing "threat" and "provocation" in its moves to pull up the DPRK again.
					
					 Explicitly speaking, the DPRK's toughest measures to bolster up nuclear deterrent are designed to cope with the increasing anti-DPRK nuclear blackmail sought by the U.S.
					
					 It is quite natural that the DPRK has steadily bolstered the nuclear striking capabilities to safeguard its dignity and sovereignty under the dangerous situation where the U.S. is getting busy, while wielding a nuclear stick.
					
					 The DPRK will steadily take measures necessary to bolster up the capabilities of the powerful revolutionary Paektusan army for nuclear attack in retaliation against the undisguised nuclear war provocation by the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					
					 The Park group of traitors is well advised to behave with discretion, if it does not want to suffer punishment while kowtowing to the U.S. nuclear war scenario.

articles.title: Provocateurs Can Not Escape Severe Punishment by DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Provocateurs Can Not Escape Severe Punishment by DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- It is the unshakable will of the service personnel and people of the DPRK to wipe out any hideous provocateurs to the last one who dare hurt the dignity of its supreme leadership.
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday says this in an article.
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet group of traitors' blasphemy against the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK is the worst unpardonable evil.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK have mercilessly punished anyone, who intends to do harm to the dignity of its supreme leadership even a bit, without the slightest pardon, patience and tolerance.
					
					 The U.S. and Park Geun Hye group had better abandon their daydream to hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership and the social system of the DPRK.
					
					 With neither nuclear bombs nor special operations can they topple down the fortress in which all servicepersons and people are rallied close around the headquarters of the revolution to devotedly defend the leader.
					
					 If a war breaks out on this land, the revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK will uninterruptedly deal a high-profile retaliatory blow to the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet group till they pay highly for their thrice-cursed hideous crimes, and the Paektusan army will inflict the most miserable ruin on the Park Geun Hye regime.
					
					 The U.S. and Park Geun Hye group of traitors shouldn't act rashly, bearing in mind that the military standoff with the DPRK will bring merciless penalty and miserable fate to them.

articles.title: S. Korean Body Calls for Scientific Verification and Reinvestigation into Warship Cheonan Sinking Incident
articles.content:
S. Korean Body Calls for Scientific Verification and Reinvestigation into Warship Cheonan Sinking Incident
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea issued a commentary on March 25.
					 Though six years have passed since the warship Cheonan sinking incident, the doubt about it has not yet been verified and the hypothesis "sinking by north's torpedo" defamed the south-north relations and created social confrontation, the commentary said, and went on:
					
					 Recently Seoul University awarded the top prize to the paper saying that the "government" failed in the scientific discussion of the incident and scientific verification and reinvestigation into it are the solution.

articles.title: S. Korean Politician Terms Park Geun Hye's Economic Policy Complete Failure
articles.content:
S. Korean Politician Terms Park Geun Hye's Economic Policy Complete Failure
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A representative of an opposition party of south Korea said on March 24 that the economic policy pursued by the Park Geun Hye regime completely failed, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 The representative accused the regime and the ruling party of passing the buck for the failure of the economy upon the people and opposition parties ahead of the "National Assembly" election.

articles.title: Heinous Provocation of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces under Fire
articles.content:
Heinous Provocation of U.S. and S. Korean Puppet Forces under Fire
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Yanbian Regional Association and its affiliated branches of the General Association of Koreans in China and the Yanbian Regional Youth Committee of the Federation of Korean Young Nationals in China was held in Yanji City, Jilin Province of China on March 25 to denounce the heinous provocation of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces.
					 Speakers condemned the U.S. and south Korean warmongers for openly vociferating about "advance into Pyongyang" and "beheading operation".
					
					 They stressed that Koreans in China would together with the people in the motherland turn out as one in the struggle for frustrating the invaders and provocateurs.

articles.title: Indonesian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Indonesian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated on March 18.
					 Rachmawati Soekarnoputri, chairwoman of the Founding Committee of the Soekarno Foundation for Education of Indonesia, and Ristiyanto, general secretary of the National Guidance Council of the Pioneer Party of Indonesia, were respectively elected chairwoman and general secretary of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize various political and cultural events to praise the exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un on the occasion of the meeting.

articles.title: Mexican Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Mexican Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A Mexican preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was formed on March 16.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.

articles.title: Tanzanian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
articles.content:
Tanzanian Preparatory Committee for 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu Formed
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A Tanzanian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated in Dar Es Salaam on March 19.
					 Francis F. Lyimo, chairman of the Tanzanian National Coordinating Committee of the Juche Idea Study Groups, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold significant political and cultural events for praising the sacred revolutionary careers and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and conduct positive solidarity activities to support the Korean people in their struggle for the country's prosperity with the above-said meeting as a momentum.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Celebrated in Russia
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) was formed by the Communist Party (Communists of Russia) on March 22.
					 The chairman of the Central Committee of the party was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give publicity to the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Il Sung and hold a seminar on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Marked in Malaysia
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Marked in Malaysia
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- A Malaysian preparatory committee for celebrating President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun) and the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu was inaugurated on March 21.
					 Chia Wing Chong, chairman of the Malaysia-DPRK Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful events for highly praising the immortal exploits of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu and introducing the DPRK which is dynamically accelerating the building of a thriving nation under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Sun Celebrated in Different Countries
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Diverse events took place in foreign countries between March 3 and 15 to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					 They included lectures in Mali and Niger and book exhibitions and film shows in Nigeria and Guinea.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the book exhibitions were DPRK publications introducing the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Korean films "Song of Sun Will Be Eternal" and "Songdowon International Children's Camp" were screened at the film shows.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Malaysian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Lauded by Malaysian Figure
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Chia Wing Chong, chairman of the Malaysia-DPRK Friendship Association, lauded President Kim Il Sung's exploits at the inaugural ceremony of the Malaysian preparatory committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt. Paektu on March 21.
					 The chairman paid the highest homage to Kim Il Sung, who devoted his all to the Korean people's happiness, defense of the country's sovereignty and the sacred cause of global independence, on his birth anniversary.
					
					 Kim Il Sung was the great leader and eternal sun of not only the Korean people but also the world progressives, the chairman said, and went on:
					
					 He was a genius of ideology and theory who clearly indicated the bright way for mankind and ushered in a new era of independence by founding the Juche idea.
					
					 He was an outstanding strategist who led to victory the arduous anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 Although he passed away, the great exploits he performed for the times and history will be remembered forever.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Media
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Foreign Media
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was praised by foreign media on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 The 19th issue of the Cambodian newspaper Kmae Amata dedicated two whole pages to an article titled "Lifetime for country and people" illustrated with his photo.
					
					 The article noted the President embarked upon the road of revolution in his teens and devoted himself to the prosperity of the country and happiness of the people till the last moments of his life.
					
					 The Ethiopian newspaper Reporter on the same day carried an article titled "Kim Il Sung, eternal sun" with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The article said:
					
					 He rendered sincere support to the developing countries in their struggle for anti-imperialist national liberation and the building of a new society, greatly contributed to developing the non-aligned movement and took warm care of all people.
					
					 Party and state leaders and prominent figures of many countries were attracted by his great benevolence after meeting him.
					
					 He is still alive in the hearts of humankind as the sun.
					
					 The March issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Iskra and the website of the Eastern Siberian Publishing House in Irkutsk Region of Russia on March 19 also carried articles praising his revolutionary career and exploits.

articles.title: British Personages Praise Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
articles.content:
British Personages Praise Peerlessly Great Persons of Mt. Paektu
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- There took place a meeting, photo exhibition and film show in Birmingham on March 12 on the occasion of President Kim Il Sung's birth anniversary (the Day of the Sun).
					 Present there were figures of the British preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun, the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the Socialist Labour Party of Britain and other political parties and masses.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos showing the exploits of the President, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A Korean film dealing with Kim Jong Un's exploits was screened at the film show.
					
					 The chairman of the Socialist Labour Party of Britain said in his speech:
					
					 Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il are the  great leaders who are boundlessly revered by progressive mankind.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists have now gone to extreme in their moves to stifle Korean socialism and it is a duty of the British progressive forces to extend invariable solidarity to the Korean revolution.
					
					 Our party will as ever fully support the Korean people's socialist cause.
					
					 The general secretary of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist) stressed that the exploits of Kim Il Sung would always be remembered not only by the Korean people but by the British progressive forces.

articles.title: U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Accused by British Political Party's Organ
articles.content:
U.S. Hostile Policy toward DPRK Accused by British Political Party's Organ
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- The March issue of Line of March, the organ of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), carried articles censuring the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					 An article titled "It is international duty to defend the DPRK. Let us oppose hysterical acts to isolate it" said:
					
					 The U.S. imperialists and their followers cooked up the "resolution on sanctions" at the UN Security Council against the DPRK over its self-defensive H-bomb test and satellite launch for peaceful purpose.
					
					 All the U.S. moves against the DPRK aim at bringing down its social system.
					
					 The world progressive forces have to fight against the U.S. imperialists' war moves together with the Korean people.
					
					 The article titled "U.S. imperialism developing new weapons of mass destruction to ignite nuclear war" disclosed that the U.S. imperialists are putting more spurs on modernizing nuclear weapons.
					
					 It said that it is no doubtful that the U.S. modernization of nuclear weapons aims at launching a preemptive strike at the independent countries such as the DPRK.
					
					 So it is natural for the DPRK to steadily bolster up its nuclear deterrent to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat, it added.

articles.title: Czech, Nepalese Organizations Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Czech, Nepalese Organizations Denounce U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
Pyongyang, March 27 (KCNA) -- Czech and Nepalese organizations issued statements on March 19 and 21.
					 The Paektusan Czech-Korean Friendship Association stated:
					
					 We strongly denounce the U.S. and south Korean authorities for staging the aggressive Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 joint military exercises involving huge military forces.
					
					 The U.S. should not force the Korean people to live in constant danger of a war but withdraw its forces from the Korean peninsula.
					
					 We support all the measures taken by the DPRK to safeguard the sovereignty of the country and nation.
					
					 We demand the U.S. immediately stop its war rehearsals and conclude a peace treaty with the DPRK.
					
					 The Nepal Journalist Association extended support to the Korean people's just cause for frustrating the provocateurs' reckless war racket.

articles.title: Provocadores no evitaran destino de desamparada alma, declara UTAC
articles.content:
Provocadores no evitaran destino de desamparada alma, declara UTAC
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- Nuestros trabajadores agricolas haran que los enemigos sientan cual caro sera el precio de su locura provocativa por atentar a la Direccion Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Asi subrayo en su declaracion fechada 27 el portavoz del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea (UTAC).
					
					Ahora todos los trabajadores agricolas de la RPDC centuplican la voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos con la vehemente indignacion a los imperialistas yanquis y la banda de Park Geun-hye que llevan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al limite de la guerra recurriendo a la provocacion de gran tamano contra la maxima dignidad de la RPDC, destaca el documento y prosigue:
					
					No sera tolerado el atroz crimen de los imperialistas yanquis y la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye tendente a atentar al Sol de la nacion que representa nuestra vida y destino y estos tipejos deben ser castigados severamente.
					
					Los soldados agricolas del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino  ya ocuparon la posicion de ataque para liberar la parte surcoreana junto con el poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu y esperan solo la orden final de la sagrada guerra de todo el pueblo y el Estado para asestar el golpe de venganza implacable a los imperialistas norteamericanos y la horda de Park Geun-hye.
					
					Ante el espiritu de defensa a ultranza al lider de todo el ejercito y el pueblo y la voluntad de aniquilar a los enemigos, las bestias imperialistas yanquis sufriran la derrota inimaginable y la traidora Park Geun-hye y su banda no evitaran el destino de desamparada alma.

articles.title: Partido Chondoista Chong-U condena EE.UU. y banda de Park Geun-hye
articles.content:
Partido Chondoista Chong-U condena EE.UU. y banda de Park Geun-hye
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Central del Partido Chondoista Chong-U publico el dia 27 una declaracion en relacion con que los imperialistas yanquis y la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye recurren a la nefanda locura provocativa para perjudicar a Dios de la nacion.
					La nota condena en nombre de todos los chondoistas y militantes del partido el crimen de gran tamano de los imperialistas yanquis y la horda traidora de Park, y prosigue:
					
					Estos criminales son la banda de los malos imperdonables para siempre por los chondoistas.
					
					Junto con todos los militares y civiles del pais, los chondoistas no perdonaran jamas a esa horda que desafia a la sagrada dignidad y regimen mas preciosos que la vida y daran el castigo implacable a los provocadores.
					
					Los chondoistas tienen la orgullosa tradicion patriotica de ponerse al frente de la lucha por defender la soberania y la dignidad del pais y la nacion enarbolando la bandera de "Rechazamiento a la invasion de los europeos y los japoneses" y "Proteccion del pais y la tranquilidad del pueblo".
					
					El CC del Partido Chondoista Chong-U vuelve a advertir con solemnidad que si los imperialistas yanquis y la banda traidora de Park siguen recurriendo al crimen de gran tamano para perjudicar la maxima dignidad de la RPDC pese a las reiteradas advertencias, recibiran una granizada de fuego de los indignados militares y civiles de Corea.
					
					Los chondoistas surcoreanos deben conocer correctamente la peor situacion de hoy y levantarse en general en la sagrada guerra justa de reunificacion por aniquilar a los demonios que traen las calamidades de toda indole en esta tierra pisoteando la dignidad de la nacion coreana y construir el paraiso terrestre reunificado y prospero.

articles.title: En RPDC las labores preventivas higienicas basadas en las ciencias y tecnicas modernas
articles.content:
En RPDC las labores preventivas higienicas basadas en las ciencias y tecnicas modernas
Pyongyang, 27 de marzo (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se desarrollan energicamente las labores de prevencion higienica apoyandose en las ciencias y tecnicas modernas.
					El Centro Nacional de Higiene y Prevencion del Ministerio de Salud Publica informa normalmente a las unidades adscritas el estado de surgimiento de las epidemias en escala mundial y los datos analizados de las ciencias y tecnicas modernas.
					
					Se activa el intercambio de informaciones entre los organos de servicios higienico-profilacticos de todo el pais segun un mapa electronico que vigila la contaminacion de aire.
					
					El sistema de telemedicina mejora extraordinariamente el nivel practico no solo de los medicos, sino tambien de los funcionarios profilacticos.
					
					Se profundizan las investigaciones para desarrollar mucho mas las medicinas preventivas a base de las ciencias y tecnicas medicinas modernas.
					
					Se desarrollan a traves de las multimedias las actividades de propaganda higienica para prevenir la transmision de epidemias que se extienden por todo el mundo, inclusive el virus ZIKA.
